reviews.review: A very good game. Custom workshop maps extend replayability very long

Jogo lindo, jogo formoso, jogo bem feito.
Definitivamente um bom jogo para co-op, feito para quem busca desafios intrigantes e engraçados, sempre inovando a cada nível e deixando várias noites divertidas, Beijos pro GrandPrix
Jogo ótimo e com uma história e jogabilidade incrível eu gostei muito
sometimes you are stuck but watch yt and complete it
An amazing journey, both alone and with a companion. Just don't let them corner you in spawn with a turret.
The cake is still a lie.

Oyun Güzel Coop Oynarken Daha Zevkli Olabiliyor Yanınıza Troll Bi Arkadaş Almadığınız Sürece Coop Zevkli Oluyor Eğer Yalnızsanız Normal Hikayeside Güzel Ayrıca Oyun İyi Olmayan Sistemlerde Bile Sorun Çıkartmıyor
Succinctly; this game is a piece of art. If you even slightly like puzzle games or story lines, you need to play portal 2 at least once in your life.

Fun game!
Great soundtrack!
Almost everything is great about this game.
Probably one of the Best Games Ever Made.

I don't like singleplayer games that often because I am boring, but this game has an immersive storyline and lots of puzzles, they are repetitive, but don't feel repetitive, they are unique in their own way. The online levels are very hard because map makers are tryhards and if you have a friend who plays this you can play co op maps. Overall I rate this game a solid 8/10
Клевая игра, есть и кооп миссии, и одиночка. Всем советую
esse jogo faz seu cérebro derreter
Muy buen juego, en especial el modo cooperativo
One of my all time favorites.
Portal 2 é excelente para jogar com o amigo, diversão, risadas e quebra cabeças garantidos. E a experiencia fica ainda melhor com os mapas da comunidade Steam
indémodable grace aux niveaux infinis, surtout à 2 avec un ami !
Fun adventure game, ya need a lot to think.

Uno dei migliori Giochi Rompicapo che abbia mai giocato.

-Ottimo Gameplay

-Ottima Storia

-La migliore Modalita' Co-Op che abbia mai provato

Как по мне, лучшая игра в истории Valve.
Из плюсов:
Отличные персонажи.
Хорошая графика, которую потянет даже моё старое ведро из 2k13.
Отличный, и очень интересный сюжет.
Хорошие головоломки, чем дальше, тем сложнее, мне даже на ютубе пришлось прохождение одной из них смотреть, потому что Wheatly, зараза, слишком сложную головоломку сделал.
Хорошая Русская озвучка, Константин Валерьевич Карасик знает своё дело.
Из минусов:
Так-же, и у Русской озвучки, есть минус, того, что 2 реплики Wheatly были вообще не озвучены.
Куски фраз, из других диалогов, поверх нынешнего. Не знаю, только ли у Русской озвучки такие проблемы.
В любом случае, это очень хороший продукт Valve, и Я всем настоятельно рекомендую купить его, я вам обещаю, не пожалеете.
pretty much the best game i've ever played

Ну тут однозначно стоит в нее играть.. Та думаю все знают о этой игре и что то писать бессмысленно)) Скажу лишь одно.. Наконец то я купил ее, ну и брату тоже.. кооп штука интересная как и сюжет в игре ;)
If you haven't played it, what have you been doing?!?

Une pépite inclassable, un jeu de réflexion qui va au delà du simple jeu de puzzle avec une histoire principale très très intéréssante. Avec une durée de vie illimité grâce au puzzle de la commu trouvable sur le workshop ce jeu pour un prix dérisoire a de quoi vous tenir quelques bonnes heures
Toda vez que eu jogo Portal sinto meu Qi aumentando em 30 pontos igual Rick e Morty
It's great. Just play it. You're welcome.

Una obra maestra sin duda, Buen desarrollo de los personajes, Graficos muy bueno hasta hoy en dia y ese gran humor que pone VALVE en sus juegos. Sin duda algo que debes de tener en tu biblioteca si eres amante de los juegos de valve, eso si compralo en las rebajas, esta muy caro comparado al precio en las ofertas :V

This game is amazing!!!!!
This game is amazing!!!!!
This game is amazing!!!!!
This game is amazing!!!!!
This game is amazing!!!!!
Игра 10 из 10 продуманный сюжет, персонажи. Очень интересные головоломки. Также после того как прошёл игру, можно ещё много часов наиграть в кооперативе.
Haven't finished it yet, but LOVE IT so far. I really like how they included more story elements to this game.
Good game (had a lot of fun playing co-op) but the replayability isn't quite there for me because you know all the puzzles, so it takes a while until I revisit this game

One of the best puzzle games to date.
Co-op is amazing
The humour and story is excellent.
Gameplay is tight, controls responsive, and mechanics are fun.
9.5/10
Amazing game that has aged well even after almost a decade!
Honestly, the best Valve game ever. Everything is awesome, timeless classic!
jogo casual perfeito para jogar com amigo.
Great gameplay, great story, looks good in 2019. 5/5
Played it on ps3, story and gameplay were great
An amazing sequel to the first game
I think we can put our differences behind us, for science. You monster.
Muy bueno para jugar solo o con un amigo
It's a must have, just buy it already, it has been so many years.

Longer and better Portal 1, awesome.
Also the final song is 💯
good game if don't play alone
Good game. Like the bubble wall things. Robot bad
